mapper.insert: insert into bill( id, userid, bill_timestamp, bill_price, bill_content, bill_category, bill_cardinfo, bill_storeinfo_name, bill_storeinfo_biznum) values( default, #{userid}, #{bill_timestamp}, #{bill_price}, #{bill_content}, #{bill_category}, #{bill_cardinfo}, #{bill_storeinfo_name}, #{bill_storeinfo_biznum})
